subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Pete Sampras never faced a break point as he handed Roger Federer a defeat at the Venetian Macao arena, wrapping up a three-match Asian exhibition series between the two tennis greats.
snippet: Pete Sampras never faced a break point as he handed Roger Federer a defeat at the Venetian Macao arena, wrapping up a three-match Asian exhibition series between the two tennis greats.
